longDesc: A large dreadful snake is at your feet, hissing at you.
detailedDesc: It looks hungry. It looks hungry.

longDesc: A small green snake is here, and it doesn't look too friendly...
detailedDesc: It looks harmless. It looks harmless.

longDesc: A small centipede is here, making its way across the floor.
detailedDesc: It looks completely harmless. It looks completely harmless.

longDesc: An ugly kobold is here, searching for dinner.
detailedDesc: It looks ugly. It looks ugly.

longDesc: The orc walks around, looking for someone to kill.
detailedDesc: You notice an evil look in its eyes... You notice an evil look in its eyes...

longDesc: A large orc is here, looking really mean.
detailedDesc: He looks dreadful. He looks dreadful.

longDesc: A tall warrior is here.  He has more scars than anyone you have ever seen.
detailedDesc: He seems to be a strong, brainless fighter. He seems to be a strong, brainless fighter.

longDesc: A tall warrior is here.
detailedDesc: He seems to know his way with weapons. He seems to know his way with weapons.

longDesc: A small hobgoblin stands here.
detailedDesc: The hobgoblin looks quite lost. The hobgoblin looks quite lost.

longDesc: A brown snake watches you.
detailedDesc: The snake looks quite mean. The snake looks quite mean.

longDesc: A white centipede is here.
detailedDesc: The centipede doesn't really seem to notice you. The centipede doesn't really seem to notice you.

longDesc: A large hobgoblin is here.
detailedDesc: The hobgoblin looks quite dangerous. The hobgoblin looks quite dangerous.

longDesc: An orc is here, looking for something (or perhaps someone?) to eat.
detailedDesc: Well, he doesn't seem to be friendly. Well, he doesn't seem to be friendly.

longDesc: A mountain lion is here, growling at you viciously.
detailedDesc: The lion looks very nasty with huge claws and big teeth. The lion looks very nasty with huge claws and big teeth.

longDesc: A hill giant is here, tossing some rocks around.
detailedDesc: The hill giant looks like he's about 9 feet tall.  By his actions you  The hill giant looks like he's about 9 feet tall.  By his actions you  quickly come to the conclusion that he isn't very intelligent.

longDesc: A small intelligent looking mage is standing here.
detailedDesc: His IQ makes almost any normal person look stupid... His IQ makes almost any normal person look stupid... It looks like he knows his way with magic.

longDesc: A large mean-looking troll is here.
detailedDesc: Well, it looks dangerous! Well, it looks dangerous!

longDesc: A large green snake is here, looks like a guardian for an evil force.
detailedDesc: You see a evil creature. You see a evil creature.

longDesc: A thief is here, all dressed in black.
detailedDesc: He seems to be counting a handful of coins.  Maybe you ought to count YOUR He seems to be counting a handful of coins.  Maybe you ought to count YOUR gold too...

longDesc: A ugly orc is standing here.
detailedDesc: It is quite disgusting to look at. It is quite disgusting to look at.

longDesc: A small harmless centipede is here.
detailedDesc: Well it doesn't seem to pay any attention to you. Well it doesn't seem to pay any attention to you.

longDesc: A human warrior is here.  He has a evil grin in his face.
detailedDesc: He doesn't look friendly at all... He doesn't look friendly at all...

longDesc: A green kobold is here.
detailedDesc: It looks slimy.. It looks slimy..
